sentences.english: Love and hate love, pain and sorrow of the dispute, we do.

sentences.english: As the proverb says , idle young, needy old.
sentences.chinese: 正如谚语所说，“少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲。”

sentences.english: She dropped her voice, and looked so sad and piteous .
sentences.chinese: 她把声音放得很低，一副悲悲戚戚的样子，真是可怜。

sentences.english: Type FOURs are empathetic to feelings of others.
sentences.chinese: 重视别人的感情世界的悲与喜，善解人意。

sentences.english: Why should the sad self sentimentas, people in the heart of friendship in.

sentences.english: In good times and poor times, movies were my 4)lifesaver.
sentences.chinese: 无论人生是喜还是悲，电影都慰籍着我。

sentences.english: Who can really sad is all detached view and enjoy life?
sentences.chinese: 谁又能够真的正超脱所有的悲与欢来看待浮生呢？

sentences.english: It is a vexed question on the controversy of pessimism of history theory and optimism of history theory.
sentences.chinese: 历史悲乐论的论争，是从古至今一直争论不休的问题。

sentences.english: Accumulation of years of deep pain and great sorrow, I could not bear soon.
sentences.chinese: 岁月累积出深刻的痛，巨大的悲，我快承受不住。

sentences.english: The interweavement of enjoyness and sadness makes up of the whole of ancient China"s aesthetic consciousness."
sentences.chinese: 悲和乐的交织构成了中国古代审美意识的整全。

sentences.english: Is the fate of the tragedy, or transmigration of the pain.
sentences.chinese: 是宿命的悲，还是轮回的痛。

sentences.english: Her five sons each cried bitter tears.
sentences.chinese: 五个儿子，个个哭得很悲。

sentences.english: The result let me feel bittersweet.
No one can live in purely sad or happy life.
sentences.chinese: 没有谁的生活会永远单纯的只有喜或只有悲。
君不见高堂明镜悲白发。
